> Plot:
>
> Ma Jun, a cop known for dispensing justice during arrests,
> teams with Hua Sheng, who&#039;s undercover, to try to bring down 
> three merciless Vietnamese brothers running a smuggling ring 
> in the months before the mainland&#039;s takeover of Hong Kong. The 
> eldest, Xian Wei Cha (called Zah), is arrested in an operation
> that exposes Sheng and almost gets him killed. His girlfriend, 
> Qiu Di, who&#039;s been unaware of Sheng&#039;s profession, wants to see 
> him quit. Jun pursues the gang tirelessly, sometimes ignoring police
> protocols. Zah&#039;s trial approaches, witnesses are in danger, and a
> showdown is inevitable.
